profile:
*** PROUDLY SERVICING: SUBZERO, WOLF, ASKO, SIRIUS BRAND APPLIANCES ONLY ***

1968 Kampen Appliance Service has been a family owned business and truly treat our customers honestly and fairly. Kampen Appliance Service has been dedicated to servicing Sub Zero and Wolf products for over 30 years and was recognized for that high level of service by being chosen as a Premier Factory Certified Service Centre.

We have the honour of being the only Premier Factory Certified Service Centre in the Greater Toronto and Hamilton Area (GTHA) and have a very close working relationship with the Sub Zero and Wolf factories. We must meet strict service requirements to maintain the "certified" designation.

profile:
At Alpha Tech Appliance Repair, we provide appliance repair and installation to customers who expect high-end repair service within a strict time frame for a reasonable price. We employ certified and experienced appliance technicians and carefully sourced appliance parts on every job. Where some service providers might cut corners, we are determined to follow through with a dedication to excellence that impresses our clients every time. Our many positive reviews are a testament to our respect and care for the clients we work with. So, if you’re looking for reliable, professional appliance repair service, look no further. 

Alpha Tech Appliance is proud to offer appliance repair services to homeowners around Toronto. With years of experience and a dedicated team of professionals, Alpha Tech appliance provides appliance repair for a variety of home appliances. When an appliance in your home breaks it can affect your daily routine, your meals and your life in general. Our appliance technicians are trained in oven repair, stove repair, refrigerator repair, dishwasher repair, washer repair, and dryer repair.

But why choose us for your appliance repair needs in Toronto? Our team of appliance technicians are highly trained and use only the most high-quality tools and parts for your repair service.

We look forward to serving you!
services:
Refrigerator Repair & Installation, Refrigerator servicing, Ice-maker repair, defrosting service
Dishwasher Repair & installation, Dishwasher drain service
Stove/Oven Repair & Installation (Including gas stoves)
Microwave Repair & Installation
Washer Repair & Installation, Washer servicing, mold & pump inspections
Dryer Repair & Installation, dryer servicing & lint line inspections & cleaning to fire prevention standards
Hood Range Repair & Installation

profile:
HIGH QUALITY APPLIANCE REPAIR AND INSTALLATION SERVICES!
Our professional technicians specialise in all makes and models of all major appliances ! Washers, dryers, refrigerators and more… Our team of professionals have the knowledge needed for fast and professional repairs. We offer same-day service so that you can get back up on track with minimal hassle!

Your appliance is our business and we know that there are many things which can go wrong, but don’t worry because at Best Solution Appliance Repair, fixing your broken items will always be affordable. You won't have to pay anything unless something really needs repairing! We offer quality labour services with fair prices for all parts included in one package. So you get what's best suited towards saving money.

Don’t let a broken appliance ruin your day, contact us today !
